verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I have bought you,
I have called you by name.
I have written My name on your heart,
And engraved yours on Mine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
My child I love you.
As the sand on the shore,
And the stars in the night sky,
So are My thoughts of you.
I have your good in mind.
My child I love you.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When you go through the water,
And walk through the flame,
Fear not, your hand is in Mine,
And I will not lead you astray.
